data.title: Preload not support on Anroid
Fixed behavior of "cc.isObject" function for undefined and null values.
data.body: On native platforms if obj is undefined or null then attempt to access **obj.__nativeObj** leads to incorrect behavior of function.

data.title: BUG:帧动画仅0帧有帧事件，则只会触发一次帧事件。
Fix typos in documentation
data.body: This pull request fixes some minor typos in the documentation.

data.title: A class template 'CreateHelper'. Just A feature.
A class template 'CreateHelper'. Just A feature.
data.body:
A class template 'CreateHelper'. Just A feature.
usage:
CreateHelper<MySprite>::create(&MySprite::initWithFile, "test.png");

[CCCreateHelper.zip](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/files/135562/CCCreateHelper.zip)

data.title: fix return value
In case of OpenGL error (context loss, etc) restart, instead of crash
data.body:
Yes, assertive programming is good, but not in the case of an OpenGL error, which is in most cases, recoverable. The cocos2dx renderer should discard the current context, in case of an error, acquire a new, and rerender the whole scene.

This is, somewhat, related to ticket #15078, since it happened quite often after showing a fullscreen controller / activity and doing anything while it's shown / being shown / being dismissed.

data.title: Random Crashes in "background"
data.body:
When the app's main controller / activity is occluded by another viewcontroller / activity, cocos2dx randomly crashes with different (quite obvious) OpenGL crashes, due to not correctly suspended. The renderer of cocos2dx should be suspended and resumed afterwards.

Apple has a quite good doc on that topic: https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/3DDrawing/Conceptual/OpenGLES_ProgrammingGuide/ImplementingaMultitasking-awareOpenGLESApplication/ImplementingaMultitasking-awareOpenGLESApplication.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008793-CH5-SW1

data.title: TextAlignment in conjunction with kerning
data.body:
Setting a TextAlignment via cocostudio, and after that changing the kerning of that label via code, results in wrong alignment.
It looks like the alignment is applied before the kerning, and the actual (freetype bitmap) font is centered in the center of the label.

See the attached image:

![err](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/396475/13107140/7e93de5e-d56c-11e5-9046-89657385f745.png)

All labels were left aligned.

data.title: Remove test/lua-tests/project/Classes/lua_module_register.h, use the one in libluacocos2d instead.
FileUtils::createDirectory fails on OS X app with sandbox
LabelTTF texts transform to white solid rectangles in Android (v3.9)
data.body:
In Android, when I exit my game while text is being displayed with a LabelTTF (home button) and then I re-enter the game (click on App icon), the text is replaced with white solid rectangles. 

I'm using cocos2dx v3.9. 

How can I fix this critical issue??

It seems as if text's texture is erased due to memory issues and never recreated...

![efaded48-5d89-463f-98da-3c602c9403ca](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5227950/13074756/f8231bfc-d4a6-11e5-88e8-9bde5bf63ffd.jpeg)

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding automatically
Fix value type error when read value of bool type from .plist file.
[ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding automatically
Fix C++ project crash caused by CC_ENABLE_GC_FOR_NATIVE_OBJECTS macro
setPhysicsBody can be called multiple times again
data.body:
Before the addition of Physics component, one was able to call `setPhysicsBody` multiple times. The current `setPhysicsBody` method for backwards compability doesn't allow that anymore, because same components can't be added multiple times. This pr fixes that.

This is a updated version of my previous pr https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14371

data.title: Add missing reference-return types
data.body: Hello, this pull request adds several missing reference-return types to avoid copying when returning the members of a class. Thanks.

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding automatically
add etc2 CPU and GPU decode. (PVR fileformat only)
data.body:
add etc2 CPU and GPU decode. (PVR fileformat only)
original source code is KTX(Khronos).
optimize for KTX cpu decode.
etc2 GPU decode setting is add "-DCC_USE_OPENGLES=3" for compile option.
## ETC2 GPU decode

GPU decode of ETC2 requires OpenGLES3.

for example.

Xcode
Preprocessor Macros
“CC_USE_OPENGLES=3”

Android
Application.mk
“APP_CPPFLAGS := -DCC_USE_OPENGLES=3”

data.title: a bug in LuaBasicConversions.cpp
data.body:
cocos2dx3.9
in function luaval_to_mesh_vertex_attrib
the operation of "vertexAttrib" has a bug
should be 
ret->vertexAttrib = (GLint)lua_tonumber(L,-1)
but the init code is
ret->type = (GLenum)lua_tonumber(L,-1)

data.title: make UIEditBox code compatible with 32bit MacOSX project
Cleanup log for New memory model
DepthTest breaks on windowResize
data.body:
Tested on cocos 3.8 & 3.10, code in JS. Set `cc.director.setDepthTest(true)` works fine until the browser window gets resized or mobile orientation changes. 
Workaround -> get window resize event and  set `cc.director.setDepthTest(true)` again, I don't think this is how it should work.
